data.name: Tracks of Thought
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Now!


Take a moment to add Tracks of Thought to your Steam Wishlist! You can also Follow to receive updates about development and release dates, and it will help us reach more players.


About the Game




Welcome to ‚ÄúThe Train." What was supposed to be just a regular commute took a strange turn after a mysterious tunnel caused everyone to forget their final destination. Where is everyone headed? What is really going on? Is it even a real train? Whatever happened, it‚Äôs up to you to step up and solve the mystery.

You won‚Äôt be doing it alone either - there are dozens of other passengers on board who all want to know where they‚Äôre going. But, not everyone will want to work together either. It‚Äôs up to you to resolve differences, using a card-based battle-of-wits system, where the goal is to resolve the conflict and find common ground.




The personality of the üêûladybugüêû is defined by you throughout the adventure. The choices made as you interact with passengers will affect the story‚Äôs path at every step throughout the train. One of seven potential companions will join you on your journey, an unlikely ally who‚Äôs your polar opposite.

Beyond that? A diverse collection of characters to meet, greet, and talk up! Every one of them is an adorable critter, with defined personalities, looks, and - possibly‚Ä¶ quests! From a üï∑Ô∏èshy spider to a real Queen Beeüêù, everyone you meet will leave an impression. Especially if you run into the biker wasps and their gang‚Ä¶





Conflicts inevitably arise when dozens of bugs are stuck on a train heading in an unknown direction. Tracks of Thought is all about resolving conflicts through empathy and communication. Pick your cards and try to find common ground with others to solve problems together!

Will it take logic and reasoning? Being sensitive and caring? Inspiring and charismatic? Find out what makes others tick and overcome their reservations to continue the adventure!




It‚Äôs a long journey to the Control Room (it‚Äôs a very long train). Each carriage is a world unto itself, all with their own passengers and challenges to overcome - from finding lost earbuds to instigating a worker revolution. Every encounter may yield new cards and little nuggets of wisdom that will help our Ladybug on a fruitful journey of self-discovery and reflection.

data.short_description: Welcome aboard! A bad case of mass forgetfulness plagues the passengers! It‚Äôs up to you to embark on a journey of self-discovery shaped by your own personality. As a lost ladybug, talk to everyone on board and uncover the train‚Äôs secret destination in a wholesome, card-based, talk-'em-up RPG!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
